thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Best Buy: Don’t Touch That Omnichannel

author: Elizabeth Winkler
title: Best Buy: Don’t Touch That Omnichannel
text:
Someone gave the Geek Squad a noogie.
Best Buy reported its highest first-quarter sales growth since 2005 on Thursday. Earnings for the quarter reached 82 cents a share, far outstripping analysts’ estimates of 74 cents a share. Instead of rewarding its performance, though, investors sent the stock down 7%.
Their reaction has to do with small...
